meanings.definition: A low, continuous sound, as of a cat purring.
meanings.sent1: The gentle muring of the cat helped me relax.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the muring of the cat from across the room.
meanings.sent3: The muring of the cat was like a lullaby to my ears.
meanings.sent4: The muring of the cat filled the room with tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The soothing muring of the cat put me to sleep.

meanings.definition: To make a low, continuous sound, as of a cat purring.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys muring softly to her pet cat.
meanings.sent2: The cat started muring as soon as I petted it.
meanings.sent3: I tried muring to see if the cat would respond.
meanings.sent4: The engine of the car began muring as it idled.
meanings.sent5: The wind muring through the trees sounded like a cat.

meanings.definition: The act of making a low, continuous sound, as of a cat purring.
meanings.sent1: The constant muring of the cat was comforting.
meanings.sent2: Her muring always puts the cat at ease.
meanings.sent3: The muring of the cat was music to my ears.
meanings.sent4: The soft muring of the cat filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: I could listen to the muring of the cat all day.
